data.title: The Draw Play
data.text:
Posts Tagged Philip Rivers

12 results.

So despite the fact that I think the original two comics look terrible (Even by my standards) the “Cry Me a Rivers” comics remain fairly popular among the fanbase, and I think the second one is one of the funnier[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Cry Me A Rivers, Part 4

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

Is it wrong that I am legitimately rooting for the Texans to win the superbowl so that I can make another one of these? Anyway, Since Matt Schaub was the current benefactor to the Chargers latest meltdown, it just seemed[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Cry Me A Rivers, Part 6

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

Well time to make all the Chargers fans sad again Of all the comics I make, I have a few dedicated Chargers fans who constantly get upset anytime I make fun of Rivers, especially in these comics. I can understand[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Cry Me a Rivers, part 7

by Dave Rappoccio on at 1:06 am

Tony Romo actually named his new boy Rivers Romo, because of course he would. Part of me really kind of wants Rivers to win a ring because I’ve got some quality ideas if he ever becomes 1 ring Rivers. Also,[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Cry Me a Rivers Reunion, part 1

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

PART 1 OF 3! 2 COMICS TO GO! The Ringless Rivers spectacular comes to a screeching climax. What will happen? Will Rivers finally break? Will Rivers finally fight back? Will Eli and Ben finally accept Rivers despite his ringlessness? Will[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

Craig Krenzel and Jim Sorgi are mocking Philip Rivers. Has Rivers reached his lowest point ever? Can Schaub finally reach him? What will he do now? Stay tuned for the surprising finale! Happy Draft Day everybody! Another reminder that I[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Philip Rivers Needs A Babysitter

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

Most animals have some sort of designation term for a large grouping. A gaggle of geese. A murder of crows. A herd of buffalo. A litter of cubs/puppies/kittens/anything adorable. A pack of wolves. A school of fish. A swarm of[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

So several weeks ago after the LA Chargers became the LA Chargers the guy being the website Uniwatch decided to have a little competition to re-design the Chargers. I decided to have a go of it. Since I’m me though,[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Philip Rivers Welcomes Geno Smith

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am

In news that nobody noticed outside maybe Chargers fans, Geno Smith is now a Charger. 1 year, 1 million. That’s like a money golf cart. We assume Geno Smith will never see action. Why would he? Philip Rivers is much[…]↓ Read the rest of this entry…

Saturn Devouring His Football Son

by Dave Rappoccio on at 12:01 am
